description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Rail' that renders a horizontally scrollable list of thumbnail cards, handles keyboard navigation, and manages focus and scrolling behavior for a TV content browsing UI. It imports React hooks, a custom Tizen keys hook, and a ThumbnailCard component.

methods.name: Rail({ title, items = [], railIndex = 0, currentRail, setCurrentRail, onOpenDetails, loading = false, error = null })
methods.description: React component that renders a scrollable list of media thumbnails with remote navigation support.

ctags.name: Rail
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Rail({ title, items = [], railIndex = 0, currentRail, setCurrentRail, on/
ctags.signature: ({ title, items = [], railIndex = 0, currentRail, setCurrentRail, onOpenDetails, loading = false, error = null })
